amendment.description: Amendment creates a pilot competitive grant program (available to no more than 10 colleges) to assist institutions of higher education in setting up college textbook rental programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 110-523 to create a pilot competitive grant program (available to no more than 10 colleges) to assist institutions of higher education in setting up college textbook rental programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryan (OH) amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
